programmes.show_description: From paragliding to ziplining, the adventures Roshni has in Mechuka give her an intense adrenaline rush.
Alex visits Karni Fort and Fort Begu in Rajasthan, where she unearths some prized dishes of the nobilities.
Venturing deep into Puntarenas, Genevieve seeks an adrenaline rush in the lush embrace of Monteverde.
Apart from deserts, Oman also has majestic, rust-colored mountain ranges, which quietly hold the country's history in them.
On her travels across Cambodia, Sukhmani is lost in the wonders of Angkor, the archaeological park that transports her to the era of the Khmer empire.
In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie's journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.
Sabrina Chakici explores the Alpine charm as well as the Habsburg Empire heritage in Innsbruck, the capital of Austria's Tyrol province.
Hungry for stories and flavours of a bygone kingdom, Alex meets Rana Sawai Harisingh II, the 24th descendant to the royal family of Begu.
Genevieve visits the charming town of Zarcero, where she chances upon the prized cheese of Costa Rica.
The renowned American novelist and writer Mark twain after traveling on this train wrote .... "It is the most enjoyable day I have spent on earth.
Ha Long Bay in Vietnam, a spectacular emerald expanse of water with nearly 2000 islands, is a treasure trove of history, legends, culture and scenery.
Sukhmani is on a break in Cambodia, where she gets to stay at a resort, which used to be the royal guest house.
The grand finale of Robbie's wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.
Roshni's journey gets off to a rocky start in Jairampur when everything goes wrong.
Many European colonies vied for dominance and cultural supremacy in Bengal. As a result, its cuisine imbibed many Western influences.
Genevieve's adventures in Costa Rica begin in the capital city, San Jose, where she checks off some Costa Rican rites of passage.
On a tour to see Plovdiv's ancient monuments and ruins, Catriona realizes why the city is called the 'Eternal City' of Bulgaria.
From the Perperikon fort to the Sofia Central Market, Catriona explores the cultural treasures of Sofia, the capital of Bulgaria.
Jamie Srubis tries some of the signature spa treatments of the Shangri La Resort at Kota Kinabalu in Sabah, Malaysia.
A striking golden Buddhist shrine in Namsai draws Roshni to it. She learns the secret behind the peaceful lives led by the monks here.
Alex meets some veteran sweet shop owners in Kolkata, who teach her to prepare forgotten Bengali sweets.
Guided by her love for coffee, Genevieve ventures into the heart of Heredia, a lush coffee-growing region.
On visiting the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, Catriona sees that there is much more to Sunny beach than meets the eye.
Holiday Inspiration. Discover the perfect holiday for you, featuring the hottest destinations and exclusive deals to make your next holiday the best one.
Robbie's journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes.
On a visit to Hawai, the land of the Mishmi tribe, Roshni stays with some members of the tribe, who treat her to a rather potent local brew.
Called 'khad maas', game meat in Rajasthan used to be slow-cooked in underground pits by soldiers to ensure that enemy troops didn't see any fire.
In the heart of Costa Rica's countryside, Genevieve embarks on a journey of cultural immersion in Chilamate.
From Perperikon Fort to Boyana church, the monuments of Sofia are portals to different periods of its rich history.
The home of a great night's sleep. Every body. Every bedroom. Every budget.
Robbie's adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle.
In Roing, Roshni visits the local market and tries an infamous chilli that has reduced seasoned foodies to tears.
Alex discovers the ingenuity and artistry of Rajasthani cuisine, as she learns to make a traditional meat preparation, which uses meat leftovers.
Costa Rica is home to nearly 30 national parks, and Genevieve sets out to explore one of them, Rinc√≥n de la Vieja.
From the magnificent Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque to the enchanting Muttrah Souq, Elisha experiences the classic Arabic charms of Oman, in Muscat.
From soothing landscapes to relaxing massages, Indeya Passfield explores all that Kandy has to offer in terms of rejuvenation.
At the Highland Games in Perth, Robbie is faced with one of the most important rites of passage for a true Highlander: the caber toss.
The host visits Dubai's very own tropical rainforest and a wildlife sanctuary that is home to wild flamingos.
Genevieve is drawn to Costa Rica's stunning Guanacaste region by its promise of thrilling water adventures.
Attending a tea festival in Pasighat gives Roshni the chance to savour some of the most premium varieties of tea produced in Arunachal Pradesh.
Nestled in the craggy embrace of Aberdeenshire's hills, Robbie stumbles upon the Scotland less bragged about.
From the limestone formations of Wadi Bani Khaled to the ocean of dunes at Wahiba Sands, Elisha gets a taste of Oman's natural heritage.
After finding his grandparents' handwritten recipes, Vikramaditya Sodawas, the owner of Karni Fort, decided to revive his family's prized recipes.
